description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the recovery partition issue preventing the installation of KB-5034439 on Server Standard 2022:

1. Utilize a script to extend the Windows Recovery (WinRE) partition. 
2. Follow the guidance provided in the Microsoft documentation linked below for steps to extend the partition accordingly.

**Details**:
- The script successfully enlarged the recovery partition, enabling the installation of the KB article without further issues. 
- It’s essential to be aware of your current recovery partition size to ensure its compatibility with the installation requirements.

For further guidance on extending the partition, please refer to Microsoft documentation: [Extend the Windows RE Partition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/windows/hardware/manufacture/desktop/add-update-to-winre?view=windows-11).
